DOC.brief_summary: 1 . Purpose study determine whether NAET procedure effective treatment child allergy-related autism spectrum disorder restore verbal nonverbal communication . 2 . Hypothesis : Children experimental group show significant improvement control group verbal nonverbal communication food allergen group , environmental allergen group , childhood immunization , relevant allergenic substance desensitize systematic way use NAET® procedure within specified period study .

The nutritional deficiency cause poor digestion , absorption , assimilation utilization essential nutrient due allergy . NAET treatment know far able eliminate allergy permanently allow sufferer live normal life . NAET blend medical knowledge non-invasive painless , holistic treatment procedure able eliminate various level sensitivity allergy permanently treat allergen . In past 22 year clinical practice , see adverse reaction NAET , apply properly train NAET practitioner .
DOC.criteria: subject ( control treatment group ) demonstrate typical autistic symptom begin NAET® treatment : make eye contact , unable communicate verbally nonverbally . All subject bring proof establish diagnosis autism spectrum disorder conventional physician . Any child history various complication illness autism spectrum disorder would disqualify . Any patient following condition also disqualify . 1 . Previous surgery , congenital deformity heart , lung , liver , brain , kidney , etc . 2 . Any type cancer 3 . Aids 4 . Any physically debilitate disorder diagnose mental retardation , Down ’ syndrome , etc . 5 . Children history severe allergy anaphylactic reaction exclued .
